column4: hi there i need help, when my laptop boot i have signal to my tv flat screen by the vga output. but when linux start there is no more signal to my vga output
sometimes with laptops the brightness gets turned down all the way too , check your fn-brightness key
have you checked your bios settings ? Also make sure you set your resolution low , you may have it set to high for your monitor but okay for your tv
I would check the bios settings for primary video output
hey is there a FN-ket on your laptop to switch from monitor to vga output ?
have you tried the FN-Whatever key to switch between vga and monitor ?
yes i have tryed it
press FN+F5 also try the Windows Key + F5
nothing hapen
while viewing on your TV , lower the resolution to very low , like 800x600 , then try switching , FN+F5
you want me to lower the resolution off my laptop screen
yes
in System , Preferences , Monitor
looking at the manual for that laptop the max resolution is 1280 x 800
ive just tryed what you said and nothing work, there is still no signal to my vga output
did you monitor ever work ?
yes i was on windows7 befor and it was working whit the flatscreen, and now when the computer start my vga output work but when ubuntu start there is no more signal to the vga output
switch to the laptop monitor and hold down FN+Right arrow key
the brightness is already at full
that have shut down my laptop screen
when my laptop screen was off, nothing happened to the vga output
#vbox
